# cook your code here
# cook your code here
for _ in xrange(input()):
    n = input()
    R = n%7
    if R == 1:
        n = n-8
    elif R == 2:
        n = n-16
    elif R == 3:
        n = n-24
    elif R == 4:
        n = n-4
    elif R == 5:
        n -= 12
    elif R == 6:
        n -= 20
    if n>=0:
        print n 
    else:
        print "-1"
